data.name: Virus Popper - Popper Pass
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the most exclusive version of Virus Popper! Get access to the funkiest weapons, cool skins, and new maps with this expansion of the cleanest game in VR.

The Popper Pass includes the following content:
  • Slurp Sucker Weapon INSTANTLY on purchase
  • Ability to unlock the following weapons in the each map progression:
    1. Vaxcaliber
    2. Jazzeroid Launcher
    3. Fire Gauntlets
    4. Space Strike
  • Two New Maps:
    1. Virus Popper: Dark Mode
    2. Slurpies Party Yacht
  • Ability to Unlock Three Incredible Skins for ALL Weapons
    1. Coral Teal Camo
    2. Neon Punk
    3. Golden Elite
  • New Mask Camo INSTANTLY on purchase:
    1. Space Slurpies Face Mask

This special pass is the best way to experience Virus Popper: Reopened content and save the galaxy! The choice is yours.
